summary: A young witch and her grandmother work together to foil the plans of a wicked warlock's son before he can use powerful spells to create chaos in the world.
cast: Kimberly J. Brown|Judith Hoag|Daniel Kountz|Joey Zimmerman|Emily Roeske|Phillip Van Dyke|Blu Mankuma|Peter Wingfield|Debbie Reynolds|Richard Side|Robin Thomas|Xantha Radley|Jessica Lucas|Casey Dubois|Scott Owen|Wren Roberts|Blake Mawson|Marc Andrew Smith
title: Halloweentown: La venganza
